[Dima](https://community.kentico.com/member/43) covered the various [options to include custom data with activity tracking](https://dev.to/byteminds_agency/activity-logging-with-xperience-by-kentico-4kh3) for Xperience by Kentico back in 2023!
I do think your scenario makes sense, but a longer term solution requires not only capturing that activity data but also exposing it to marketers and allowing them to act on it in Xperience's admin UI.
No promises, but maybe we'll see future improvements delivered through [AIRA](https://docs.kentico.com/x/aira_xp) 🤔.
